ai-patthana23.45:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana23.45:0.3_0: Instead, they rub into rapture and joy.
ai-patthana23.45:1.1_0: causes and conditions that give rise to rapture.
ai-patthana23.45:2.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the bliss that gives rise to bliss.
ai-patthana23.45:3.1_0: There is no cause or condition for equanimous bliss.
